column2: Brilliant
This character is distinguished by their unusual mental keenness and alertness.
Smart
This character is both more intelligent and cleverer than most.
Bright
This character quickly understands and overcomes mental challenges.
Dim
This character has been afflicted with below-average intelligence.
Foolish
This character has questionable decision-making abilities.
Idiot
While sentient, this character has a tough time proving it to others.
Tough
This character shakes off wounds with a mere shrug.
Hardy
This character is hardy and sturdily built.
Soft
This character is not the type suited for blood and glory.
Delicate
This character has a fragile constitution and trouble with disease and wounds.
Beautiful
This character is famous for their beauty, many have difficulty averting their gaze.
Pretty
This character is pleasing to the eye.
Plain
This character lacks any sort of attractive qualities.
Unsightly
Many are repulsed when glancing at this character.
